name: Serenity (Darezar of Eledris)
description:
Serenity was made for the 7th week of the Chronicles GameDev Challenge. I took upon myself to try and create a 1D game (or come as close to it as possible, taking into consideration that people can't see strictly 1D shapes).

In this game, your goal is to protect the Monastery (grey) from the enemies (red) and destroy their Gate (light red) using Monks (green).

Every fraction of a second, the Monks and enemies move. If an enemy steps on a Monk, the Monk dies. However, when you press SPACE, the Monk that is further along on the map creates a water spell, which stays active for a short time and kills any enemies that step into it. The spell then has a short cooldown.

The Monastery and the Gate periodically spawn Monks and enemies respectively.

If 3 enemies reach the Monastery, you lose. If 3 Monks reach the Gate, you win.

You can adjust the game's difficulty on the left side of the screen.
